survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction and engagement with the current wellness program, identifying areas for improvement and measuring overall effectiveness.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the wellness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale for clarity. Ensure options cover the full range of familiarity.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the wellness programs offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which wellness programs have you participated in during the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Respondents should be able to select multiple options. Include an opt-out option for those who haven't participated.

script.question_text: Which wellness programs have you participated in during the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the wellness programs you have participated in?
questions.client_notes: Include a balanced scale with a neutral midpoint. Add an opt-out option for non-participants.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the wellness programs you have participated in?

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in wellness programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Programs are not relevant to my needs
questions.client_notes: Include an open-text option for 'Other' responses to capture additional barriers.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with open-text follow-up for 'Other' (MULTI_CHOICE).

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in wellness programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Programs are not relevant to my needs

questions.question_text: Please specify any additional barriers not listed above.
questions.client_notes: Open-text field to capture unique responses. Ensure mobile-friendly input.

script.question_text: Please specify any additional barriers not listed above.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's wellness programs to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) scale. Include an opt-out option for non-participants.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's wellness programs to a colleague?

questions.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered?

questions.question_text: How has participation in wellness programs impacted your overall well-being?
questions.client_notes: Include both positive and negative impact options to capture full range of experiences.

script.question_text: How has participation in wellness programs impacted your overall well-being?

questions.question_text: How often do you engage with wellness program communications (emails, newsletters, etc.)?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure engagement with communications.

script.question_text: How often do you engage with wellness program communications (emails, newsletters, etc.)?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving the wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback. Ensure sufficient character limit.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving the wellness programs?
